good.recommendation: Improve indoor air quality by opening windows to allow fresh, clean air to circulate
Indulge in outdoor pursuits and savor the natural environment

moderate.recommendation: Maintain indoor air purity by closing windows to prevent outdoor pollutants from entering
To minimize exposure to air pollution, sensitive groups should limit outdoor exercise

ufsg.recommendation: If you're in a sensitive group, wear a mask outside to reduce exposure to air pollution
Improve your indoor air quality by utilizing an air purifier.
Protect indoor air quality by keeping windows closed to prevent outdoor pollutants
Limit outdoor exercise to reduce air pollution exposure for optimal health.

Improve your indoor air quality by utilizing an air purifier.
Protect indoor air quality by keeping windows closed to prevent outdoor pollutants
Protect your health by avoiding outdoor exercise and minimizing exposure to air pollution.
